body:
Hey, i was looking to apply for staff and i had some questions
1. Are staff apps open because when i click on the staff apps section, it is just blank and without any directions
2. Is there a format which we have to use to apply for staff or do we just create our own?

tenks ;p

title: staff

replies.body:
1- Yes , you need to apply in these section. The post with the criteria is in another one.

2- In the criteria post. You need to copy and paste it with the answers in your app.

replies.body: You can see only your post in staff applications section.
